Name: X-Plane 11
About the game: The future of flight simulation is now. X-Plane 11 is the detailed, realistic, and modern simulator you’ve been waiting for. New in X-Plane 11 A completely redesigned, intuitive user interface that makes setting up and editing your flight a breeze. Consistently usable 3-D cockpits and stunningly high-resolution exterior models for all included aircraft. A new effects engine for lighting, sounds, and explosions. Realistic avionics: all planes are IFR-ready right out of the gate. Busy, “living” airports with pushback tugs and roaming fuel trucks, able to service both your aircraft and the simulator’s AI planes. New buildings & roads to better simulate European cities …and more!
Meta Title: X-Plane 11: Mar 30, 2017, Laminar Research and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on X-Plane 11? Check out the release date (Mar 30, 2017), developer insights from Laminar Research, and a complete game summary.
